definition: abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: He entered Harward University, a university that many people dream of.
sentences.chinese: 他考取了哈佛大学，一所许多人都向往的大学。

sentences.english: Dr Matthew Stephenson, Assistant Professor, Harvard Law School.
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂芬森马修博士，助理教授，哈佛大学法学院。

sentences.english: He attended Harvard University in Massachusetts.
sentences.chinese: 他上了麻州的哈佛大学。

sentences.english: Someday, he hopes to continue his studies at Harvard University .
sentences.chinese: 他希望会有那么一天可以在哈佛大学继续研读。

sentences.english: 1900-1907 attended Harvard University and Columbia University.
sentences.chinese: 1907年哈佛大学和哥伦比亚大学。

sentences.english: The scene of the GREs held at Harvard.
sentences.chinese: 这是哈佛大学举办GRE考试的盛况。
他在哈佛大学获得博士学位。

sentences.english: The Fairbank Center for Chinese Studies at Harvard sponsored the conference.
sentences.chinese: 哈佛大学费正清中国研究中心赞助了此次会议。

sentences.english: As known, the study in Harvord is quite stressfull.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，哈佛大学里学习非常紧张。

sentences.english: For example, Harvard College is the undergraduate part of Harvard University.
sentences.chinese: 例如，哈佛学院就是哈佛大学的本科部分。

sentences.english: Soon enough, Kleiner would be offered a seat in Harvard's class of 2014.
sentences.chinese: 克莱纳很快成为哈佛大学2014届的一名学生。

sentences.english: I had seen him learn how to dominate the faculty of Havard University.
sentences.chinese: 我曾经看到他学会如何控制哈佛大学的教授会。

sentences.english: I attended Cental South University and Harvard.
sentences.chinese: 我毕业于中南大学和哈佛大学。

sentences.english: She teaches at Harvard's Department of Linguistics.
sentences.chinese: 她在哈佛大学语言学系任教授。

sentences.english: This is the website maintained by Rowland Institute at Harvard University.
sentences.chinese: 这是哈佛大学罗兰研究所创建的网站。

sentences.english: I'm going to Harvard University to do post-graduate work in medicine.
sentences.chinese: 我打算去哈佛大学念研究生。

pinyin: Pu3 lin2 si1 dun4 Da4 xue2
Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Da4 xue2
Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2

definition: University of California/abbr. for 加利福尼亞大學|加利福尼亚大学[Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2]

pinyin: Huo4 pu3 jin1 si1 Da4 xue2
Da2 te4 mao2 si1 Xue2 yuan4
